'''Wyratt''' is an [[NPC]] located in the [[City of Mondstadt]], [[Mondstadt]]. He can be found guarding one of the doors of the library inside the [[Knights of Favonius Headquarters]].

===Appearance===
Wyratt wears one of the standard uniforms of the Knights of Favonius. The uniform consists of a black long-sleeve shirt and horse riding pants with white plate armor worn on top. However, the poleyns, greaves, and sabatons are black. The Knights of Favonius crest decorates the breastplate.

{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Wyratt:''' Hello, how may I help?
:{{DIcon}} What is this place?
::'''Wyratt:''' The main hall of the Knights of Favonius Headquarters. Please keep noise to a minimum.
::'''Wyratt:''' Please wipe your shoes before entering the Library to avoid taking any dust or dirt inside.
:{{DIcon}} Goodbye.
::'''Wyratt:''' Goodbye. Don't forget to close the door behind you when you leave.

==Trivia==
* You can speak to Wyratt from inside the library, even through the closed door. His voice lines can also be heard while inside the library.
